title: Guardian Antivirus 2008
description:
***************************
   * Guardian Antivirus 2008 *
   ***************************

    3-in-1 Protection For Your PC

 * AntiVirus *
Guardian AV provides true defense against online problems. It automatically cleans viruses, Trojans, Spywares, worms and
protects you from unauthorized use of your PC. It comes with fast and continious updates to take care of various threats on
the world wide web. It also has mail protection to scan and clean all incoming mail and attachments. 

 * AntiSpyware * 
Spywares have become the most common threat to internet users. They get installed on your PC automatically without your
knowledge. They collect your personal information, or may change the settings of your computer without your consent. Guardian
AV cleans spywares and blocks in realtime all their activities to take care of your privacy.

 * AntiRootkit *
Rootkits are hidden threats. They work at a level where almost no antivirus can reach. Some of the rootkits are designed to
protect malwares. Guardian AntiRootkit detects and removes hidden rootkits and protects you from this hidden threat.

 * Low System Resources, higher Performance *
Built on the low resource consuming antivirus engine of Quick Heal(TM) Total Security 2008, GuardianAV(TM) takes as low as 80 MB 
disk space and just 10 MB of RAM to provide you all round protection.

 * Auto Restore From Hijackers *
Restore the settings of your PC and its control, in case if it is hijacked by spywares or internet malwares.

 * Minimum System Requirements *
> Windows 98/ME/2000 SP3 or higher/XP SP1 or higher/Vista
> 300 MHz Intel Pentium (or compatible) or higher
> 128 MB of RAM, 75 MB hard disk space
> DVD or CD-ROM Drive
> Internet Explorer 6.0 or higher
> Access to Internet for updates/upgrades.


 * Installation Instructions *
1. Mount the 'GuardianAV.iso' file with Deamon Tools, Alcohol 120 or something like that, or burn on a disk.
2. A splash screen should appear.
3. Click 'Install Guardian AV'.
4. When asked for registration, select 'Re-activate' and enter Serial Number - M-4684f0b8CD
                                                               Activation Number - M-2394408

5. After installation, update the program and restart.

Enjoy!
